QuestData.Title: Deliver the Thread
QuestData.Description: Here is your thread, $n. It has a thousand uses, from binding evil spirits to sewing life into inanimate objects.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Ghost Hair Thread to Abercrombie in his tower at Beggar's Haunt.
QuestData.CompletionText: I need to string the ghost hair thread along my door and my windows to keep out unwanted spirits. Did you get it for me?
QuestData.RewardText: Delightful! This will do splendidly...$B$BHere, good $n, take this as payment for your honorable deed.
